case.name: Arash Gamethrowing Announcement
case.description: Arash declares that he's too horny to keep playing seriously and he's going to start throwing the game so he can get to masturbating sooner.

case.name: Arash Mysterious Fan
case.description: Arash pulls out a hand fan to cool himself down, but doesn't know where it came from.

case.name: Arash Hugs
case.description: Arash tries to get the other players to hug him.

case.name: Stella
case.description: Arash shouts the name of his Noble Phantasm when he finishes, probably confusing everyone else.

case.name: Arash Snacks
case.description: Arash offers to buy snacks for the other players. He might also offer drinks ("drinks" marker) or specifically mention hummus ("hummus" marker).

case.name: Arash and N Sweater
case.description: Arash offers N his sweater as a blanket, but then realizes it's missing.

case.name: Arash FMK
case.description: Arash gives an amusing response to a fuck-marry-kill question.

case.name: Arash Servant
case.description: Arash mentions being a Servant. He'll probably explain what that means in the next line, if he hasn't already.

case.name: Arash Servant Explanation
case.description: Arash explains what being a Servant means.

case.name: Don't You Worry Child
case.description: Arash mentions his favorite song. If the "sing" marker is set, he actually starts singing it.

case.name: Arash Gamethrowing 2
case.description: Alternate case for Arash Gamethrowing Announcement.

case.name: Names
case.description: Small talk question about names.

case.name: Thinking of Friends
case.description: Arash thinks of one or two fellow Servants. This sets a marker so he'll ask a question inspired by them later.

case.name: Anne and Mary
case.description: Arash asks a question about inseperable people.

case.name: Edison and Tesla
case.description: Arash asks a question about rivals.

case.name: Hans
case.description: Arash asks a question about looking young.

case.name: Kiyohime
case.description: Arash asks a question about yanderes.

case.name: Martha
case.description: Arash asks a question about public and private faces.

case.name: Okita
case.description: Arash asks a question about getting sick.

case.name: Serenity
case.description: Arash asks a question about self-esteem.

case.name: Waver and Iskandar
case.description: Arash asks a question about cute couples.

case.name: Hobbies
case.description: Small talk question about hobbies.

case.name: Seasons
case.description: Small talk question about seasons.

case.name: Books
case.description: Small talk question about books.

case.name: Travel
case.description: Small talk question about travel.

case.name: Cooking
case.description: Small talk question about cooking.

case.name: Thoughts
case.description: Small talk question about how people think.

case.name: Excuses
case.description: Small talk question about silly excuses.

case.name: Animals
case.description: Small talk question about animals.

case.name: Midnight
case.description: Small talk question about staying up late.

case.name: Important Things
case.description: Small talk question about cherished things.

case.name: Shirts
case.description: Small talk question about favorite shirts.

case.name: Can't Sleep
case.description: Small talk question about what people think about when they can't sleep.

case.name: Temperature
case.description: Small talk question about temperature preferences.

case.name: Holiday
case.description: Small talk question about holidays.

case.name: Singing
case.description: Small talk question about singing.

case.name: Flowers
case.description: Small talk question about flowers.

case.name: Blackout
case.description: Small talk question about drunken escapades.

case.name: Winded
case.description: Arash is pretty thoroughly worn out from finishing, and won't respond to any targets for a few turns.

case.name: Blowback
case.description: Arash doesn't seem to like his NP very much.

notes.note: It's a bit beyond my skill level, but it'd be fun to see this expanded into a whole exchange.
Would be fun to see this expanded into a little exchange.
I don't know why I've always associated that song with Arash but it just *clicked*.
For anyone interested, here's my source for Arash's prayers: http://www.avesta.org/kanga/ka_english_kanga_epub.pdf
This is a sorting dialogue to help thin out the small talk questions.
This case was hidden due to no longer making sense after changes were made to the targeted character. If you're rewriting this character, feel free to delete it.

markers.marker: Arash is concerned about 9s seeming to have come dry.
Arash tells Aella he doesn't mind if she watches him.
Arash is thinking about Anne and Mary.
Arash answers Brock's question about how long he's been an archer.
Arash comes to his senses again after being completely exhausted by his forfeit.
Arash answers Brock's question about weapons.
Arash has a few lines implying he's sweet on Hassan Serenity.
Arash quietly prays if things look like they're going pear-shaped.
Arash calms himself by reciting prayers in Avestan if he's nervous about a bad hand.
Arash answers one of Jesse's questions.
Arash mentiones that he can play the bass guitar.
Arash compliments Blake's ears.
Arash talks about what being an archer means to him.
Arash offers Chihiro a hug when he's nervous about stripping.
Arash tries to warn Chun-Li that Juri's behind her.
Arash offers Komi-san some life advice.
Arash recognizes Misato's quotes from Cruel Angel's Thesis, and tries to remember how the song goes.

When he's finished masturbating, Arash is tapped out enough he gets a little dizzy if other arousing stuff happens. This marker tracks when he mentions feeling overstimulated, in case anyone wants to respond.
Arash offered drinks during the snack-buying line.
Arash offers a hug to D.va when she asks for one.
Arash is thinking about Edison and Tesla.
Arash is interested in Erufuda's offer to spar together.
Checks whether Arash has complained about an opponent's choice of clothing to remove.
Arash pulls a hand fan out of nowhere and is just as confused as anyone else.
Arash expresses interest in Florina's song.
Arash offers to get food.
Arash offers a hug to a gloomy character, thinking they probably need it.
Arash is thinking about Hans.
There is no way Arash isn't a cuddlebug and Delightworks can fight me on this.
Arash mentioned hummus during the snack-buying line.
Arash tells Jessie he can't help the messy hair.
Arash speculates that he could probably beat Jin in a fight.
Arash isn't fond of the blowback on his NP.
Arash compliments Joey on her vanishing tricks.
Arash spots Jotaro lying about how many cards he's switching.
Arash is curious about the text floating around Jotaro.
Arash likes Kamina's approach to the game.
Arash is feelng a little overwhelmed by Kamina's manliness.
Arash admires Kamina's tendency to take life by the horns.
One of Kamina's sandals hit Arash in the knee.
Kamina mentioning the light of the morning sun leaves Arash reminiscing about the day he died.
Arash is mildly jealous of Jura for being able to dream of having kids.
Arash explains that Servants are sterile.
Arash is thinking about Kiyohime.
Arash offers a hug to Kyoko after seeing her burnt hands.
Arash joins in when Kamina quotes Libera Me From Hell.
Arash asks about Mia's magatama.
Arash is thinking about Martha.
Arash tells Megumin he's fought dragons.
Arash explains to Megumin that some people like how shaved bits look.
Arash tells Megumin about protecting the timestream.
Arash protests Megumin claiming trophies.
Apparently, Merlin taught Arash to play poker.
Arash mentions being able to shoot meteors.
Arash tells Miko she's not the only ruler in disguise as a man.
Arash tells Miko he's clairvoyant.
Arash thinks Miko's powers sound tiring.
Arash tells Miko he's a ghost.
Arash tells Miko he was content with his life as a soldier.
Arash tells Miko he was a soldier in life.
Arash expresses interest in Misato's offer of drinks.
Arash offers Misato a hug when she's unhappy about Bi.
Arash finds Moon's pun on his name genuinely funny.
Arash tries to give N masturbation advice.
Arash promises to keep Nagisa's secret.
Arash isn't happy about Nami stealing clothes.
Arash offers Natsuki a chair.
Arash finds N's rambling about math endearing.
Arash offers to help N with his necklace.
Arash offers N his scarf as a blanket, then realizes he can't find it.
Arash is thinking about Okita.
Arash wonders if a character in a school uniform is old enough to be at the Inventory.
Arash explains why he didn't intervene in Meia and Revy's fight.
Arash will ask about animals.
Arash asked a question about inseperable people.
Arash will ask about drunken escapades.
Arash will ask about books.
Arash will ask about cooking.
Arash asked a question about rivalries.
Arash will ask about excuses.
Arash will ask about flowers.
Arash asked a question about looking younger than you are.
Arash will ask about hobbies.
Arash will ask about holidays.
Arash will ask about insomnia.
Arash asked a question about obsession.
Arash asked a question about public versus private selves.
Arash will ask about staying up late.
Arash will ask about names.

Arash will ask about seasons.
Arash asked a question about isolation.
Arash will ask about shirts.
Arash will ask about music.
Arash will ask about temperature.
Arash will ask about thoughts.
Arash will ask about travel.
Arash will ask about treasured things.
Arash asked a question about cute couples.
Arash answers Revy's question about his tastes in music.
Arash offers a hug to Ryu when he's sad about taking off sentimental accessories.
Arash offers to help Ryuji get his balance after he strains his leg.
Arash notes that Ryuko and Senketsu make cute cuddlers.
Arash assures Ryuko he's not in pain.
Arash tells Saki how he died.
Arash tells Saki that "ghost" would be more accurate for him than "zombie".
Arash is apparently more startled that Saki decided to take off her makeup by dumping water on her head than that she's a zombie.
Arash tells Saki he's not wearing makeup.
Arash likes relaxing around Chaldea.
Arash scolds Streaming-chan for filming the other players without consent.
Dodging his criticism isn't putting Arash in a good mood.
This is serious business.
Arash is startled by Streaming-chan's proposition.
Arash is a lovemaker, not a fucker.
Unsure how to react to the whole line of questioning.
Arash's pet peeve is halfassing things.
Giving your all is worth the effort.
Yes, that Arash.
Yes, really, that Arash.
Marks a few lines where Arash gently scolds another player for making someone else at the table uncomfortable.
Arash isn't the one to be asking questions about summoning.
What's the question, Streaming-chan?
Arash's Noble Phantasm is a martyr shot called Stella.
Even a temporary death is a last resort for Arash.
Chaldea's a busy place, there's quite a few eligible people.
People will fuck anything these days.
Merlin's a good lay.
Arash is feeling flustered by the advances of a character with the "seductive" tag.
Arash tells Sei about his perpetually messy hair.
Arash is thinking about Serenity.
Arash has mentioned being a Servant.
Arash explains what Servants are.
Arash offers to steady Shimikaze while she gets her balance.
Arash has a few lines where he starts singing - they're marked with this.

Arash offers to spar with characters who have weapons.
Arash interprets Star Platinum's forfeit help as probably more affectionate than Jotaro meant it to be.
Arash is apparently magical and/or badass enough to see Stands.
Checks if Arash name-drops Stella without context.
It's Tiregan, Arash's holiday!
Arash muses about ultimate attacks.
Arash asks for a washcloth for Chazz.
Arash is thinking about Waver and Iskandar.
Arash mentions Merlin's penchant for shenanigans.
Arash offers to help Yuelia with her neckpiece.

Arash answers Yuelia's question about luck.
